sentiment_classifier.pipeline module

sentiment_classifier.pipeline.get_prediction_pipeline(pipe) → sklearn.pipeline.Pipeline

Gets the production prediction pipeline without oversampling step.

Param

training pipeline

Returns

new prediction pipeline

Get predetermined ML training pipeline.

Parameters

dag_config – DAG/ETL configuration

Returns

training Pipeline

sentiment_classifier.run_dag module

sentiment_classifier.run_dag.get_args()

Parses command line arguments

sentiment_classifier.run_dag.get_flow(dag_config: dict, run_search: bool = False) → prefect.core.flow.Flow

Gets the prefect Flow containing the DAG to be run.

Parameters

  • dag_config – comprehensive configuration of all parameters in the ETL DAG

  • run_search – whether to run hyperparamter search, if false, model training will be run.

Returns

a prefect Flow

sentiment_classifier.run_dag.main()

Main entry point to run prefect DAG

sentiment_classifier.util module

sentiment_classifier.util.listdir_ext(path: str, extension: str) → Generator[str, None, None]

List all files in path having extension.

:param path directory path :param extension: file extension :return: generator on files at path having extension

sentiment_classifier.util.unique_fname(full_path: str) → str

Get unique file name for given full path to MELD data file. The return format is ‘[dialog]_[utterance]’.

Parameters

full_path – full path to MELD .mp4 data file

Returns

unique id of data file (only unique within dataset directory)
